video.title: Scooby-Doo!: Mystery Incorporated
video.synopsis: In this animated update of the cartoon classic, Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and their pals solve spooky mysteries in a hamlet bedeviled by supernatural bedlam.

episodes.synopsis: A radioactive barrel is accidentally opened, releasing a hideous sewer beast that cocoons its victims in frozen yogurt.
episodes.title: Beware the Beast from Below

episodes.synopsis: Scooby and the gang are forced to stay overnight in a ghost town when someone steals the Mystery Machine's engine.
episodes.title: The Creeping Creatures

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious ghost trucker is terrorizing Crystal Cove. Meanwhile, all the doorknobs around town are disappearing.
episodes.title: The Secret of the Ghost Rig

episodes.synopsis: Crystal Cove Beach is attacked by a hideous man crab who has taken a liking to a beach volleyball tournament's female players.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Man Crab

episodes.synopsis: A hideous creature named Que Horrifico is turning the children of Crystal Cove into monsters.
episodes.title: The Song of Mystery

episodes.synopsis: There's a new girl at Crystal Cove High named Alice May, and she's set her romantic sights on Fred. There's only one problem: Alice is dead!
episodes.title: The Legend of Alice May

episodes.synopsis: Velma's favorite band comes to town, and the gang has front-row seats. Unfortunately, so does an evil specter named the Phantom.
episodes.title: In Fear of the Phantom

episodes.synopsis: The Royal Knights Faire has come to Crystal Cove, and the whole gang is in attendance. Unfortunately, so is a scary gnome who is attacking guests.
episodes.title: The Grasp of the Gnome

episodes.synopsis: A pair of brutal gargantuas begin breaking apart the town, which sadly mirrors the fractured relationship of Mystery, Inc.
episodes.title: Battle of the Humungonauts

episodes.synopsis: After a horrible, mechanized beast begins attacking the town, all fingers begin pointing at Scooby.
episodes.title: Howl of the Fright Hound

episodes.synopsis: There's a vampire loose in town, terrorizing the residents and stealing an odd assortment of loot.
episodes.title: The Secret Serum

episodes.synopsis: With Mystery, Inc. broken up, the gang decides to check out life after high school and spend a weekend at Darrow College.
episodes.title: The Shrieking Madness

episodes.synopsis: Bugs are taking over Crystal Cove and attacking some of its most prominent citizens.
episodes.title: When the Cicada Calls

episodes.synopsis: The Mystery, Inc. gang has been invited to compete in the annual Teen Mystery Solver's Convention.
episodes.title: Mystery Solvers Club State Finals

episodes.synopsis: A rowdy Orc biker gang has decided to roll through Crystal Cove and no one is very happy about it.
episodes.title: The Wild Brood

episodes.synopsis: Love has come to Crystal Cove. Love in the form of an evil woman by the name of Aphrodite.
episodes.title: Where Walks Aphrodite

episodes.synopsis: The gang investigates the disappearance of the original Mystery, Inc. gang.
episodes.title: Escape from Mystery Manor

episodes.synopsis: After an exchange student named Mai Lee shows up in town to stay with Velma, strange kung fu wizards begin attacking the town trying to get her.
episodes.title: The Dragon's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Scooby and Shaggy win a dinner date with their hero, Vincent Van Ghoul.
episodes.title: Night Fright

episodes.synopsis: Velma is feeling like a fifth wheel. Fred has Daphne, and Shaggy has Scooby. Who does she have?
episodes.title: The Siren's Song

episodes.synopsis: After the mayor purchases a haunted temple off the Internet, Crystal Cove's only theme park, Creepy Spooky Terror Land, is besieged by a manticore.
episodes.title: Menace of the Manticore

episodes.synopsis: Fred's favorite adventurer, Rick Spartan, has come to town to take over the school's biology class.
episodes.title: Attack of the Headless Horror

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Jones is under attack by a poltergeist in his own home, and the only ones who can help him are the Scooby gang.
episodes.title: A Haunting In Crystal Cove

episodes.synopsis: There's a new lawman in town, and his name is Dead Justice, an undead cowboy sheriff who used to patrol the streets of Crystal Cove.
episodes.title: Dead Justice

episodes.synopsis: The Scooby gang is getting close to finally unraveling what happened to the original Mystery Incorporated kids.
episodes.title: Pawn of Shadows

episodes.synopsis: The mystery comes to a close. The Scooby gang finally gets to the bottom of what happened to the original Mystery, Inc. and why they disappeared.
episodes.title: All Fear the Freak

episodes.synopsis: With the gang split up, Crystal Cove is being tormented by an evil man-baby called "Crybaby Clown."
episodes.title: The Night the Clown Cried

episodes.synopsis: Velma and Hotdog Water are working for Mr. E in trying to "acquire" an item from a museum exhibit in Moscow.
episodes.title: The House of the Nightmare Witch

episodes.synopsis: The gang is on the case when Crybaby Clown returns with a vengeance and starts kidnapping folks all over Crystal Cove -- including Daphne!
episodes.title: The Night the Clown Cried II - Tears of Doom!

episodes.synopsis: A rash of strange crimes occurs when a number of prominent Crystal Cove citizens destroy the things they love most!
episodes.title: Web of the Dreamweaver!

episodes.synopsis: A traveling curio wagon arrives in Crystal Cove, and a carnival barker unveils the "Hodag," a beast supposedly found in the wilds of Wisconsin.
episodes.title: The Hodag of Horror

episodes.synopsis: When a local artist's creation comes to life and tries to destroy him, Mayor Nettles asks the gang to investigate.
episodes.title: Art of Darkness!

episodes.synopsis: While watching a free screening of an old Vincent Van Ghoul movie at Crystal Cove Cemetery, the gang is attacked by the Graveyard Ghoul!
episodes.title: The Gathering Gloom

episodes.synopsis: Two hikers are attacked by Lilith, a dark-winged angel of destruction. Back in town, the gang talks to the climbers and sets out to solve the mystery.
episodes.title: Night on Haunted Mountain

episodes.synopsis: When a crazed, ghostly judge named Hebediah Grimm starts terrorizing Crystal Cove and judging its youth, the Mystery Inc. gang gets involved.
episodes.title: Grim Judgment

episodes.synopsis: On a ski trip, the Mystery Inc. gang gets diverted by a huge avalanche and has to stay the night at a creepy old library.
episodes.title: Night Terrors

episodes.synopsis: When Cassidy Williams is attacked by deep-sea killer robots, Mystery Inc. helps her unravel the mystery of who is sending them and why.
episodes.title: The Midnight Zone

episodes.synopsis: The mayor enlists the gang to investigate the mystery of the Scarebear -- a mutant bruin that's terrorizing the town of Destroido.
episodes.title: Scarebear

episodes.synopsis: When a mean demon named Krampus starts terrorizing naughty kids all over Crystal Cove, the Mystery Inc. gang investigates.
episodes.title: Wrath of the Krampus

episodes.synopsis: Dynomutt and Blue Falcon team with the Mystery Inc. gang to unravel the mystery of a horrible dragon-robot that's terrorizing Crystal Cove.
episodes.title: Heart of Evil

episodes.synopsis: When the Mystery Inc. crew delves into Crystal Cove's history, the mummy of a Franciscan friar comes to life and starts terrorizing the gang.
episodes.title: Theater of Doom

episodes.synopsis: The Mystery Inc. crew looks into the sheriff's claims that aliens are stealing Crystal Cove's high-tech devices to rebuild their spaceship.
episodes.title: Aliens Among Us

episodes.synopsis: When a herd of mutated cattle threatens Crystal Cove, the gang learns it's all part of a plot by Prof. Pericles to get back the Planispheric disc.
episodes.title: The Horrible Herd

episodes.synopsis: When an undead ska band's music spreads a dancing sickness throughout Crystal Cove, it's up to Shaggy and Scooby to save the day.
episodes.title: Dance of the Undead

episodes.synopsis: The gang must try to stop a gluttonous gluten demon before it consumes all the bread, pasta and other tasty eats in Crystal Cove.
episodes.title: The Devouring

episodes.synopsis: When a motorcycle-riding highwayman kidnaps all the women of Crystal Cove, it's up to the gang to stop the scoundrel.
episodes.title: Stand and Deliver

episodes.synopsis: Fred finds himself thrust into the future, where Crystal Cove is a wasteland and everyone has perished -- except for a now-elderly Daphne.
episodes.title: The Man in the Mirror

episodes.synopsis: To learn more about the ancient Annunaki race, the Evil Entity buried under Crystal Cove and the way to defeat him, the gang undergoes hypnosis.
episodes.title: Nightmare in Red

episodes.synopsis: The Mystery Inc. crew heads south of the border to search for the Heart of the Jaguar.
episodes.title: Dark Night of the Hunters

episodes.synopsis: The gang returns from the Yucatan, only to find that evil Prof. Pericles has enslaved the whole town to unearth the cursed treasure.
episodes.title: Gates of Gloom

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of Prof. Pericles, the gang travels through the underground caverns and soon discovers why they've been collecting the four keys.
episodes.title: Through the Curtain

episodes.synopsis: The Mystery Inc. crew must work together to prevent the Evil Entity from bringing the world to an end.
episodes.title: Come Undone
